mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT P.*,T.PROJECT_NAME FROM (select A.APPLY_ID AS APPLYID,A.APPLY_CAOGERY AS CAOGERY, A.NAME AS APPLYNAME, A.APPLYDATE AS APPLYDATE, A.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID, A.CHECK_STATUS AS STATUS from APPLY A where A.ISDELETE ='0' union ALL select U.APPLYUNIT_ID AS APPLYID,U.APPLYUNIT_CAOGERY AS CAOGERY, U.APPLYUNIT_NAME AS APPLYNAME, U.APPLYUNIT_DATE AS APPLYDATE, U.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID, U.applyunit_status AS STATUS from APPLY_UNIT U where U.Isdelete ='0') P,PROJECT T WHERE T.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY P.PROJECT_ID,P.APPLYDATE ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{length} )WHERE RN > #{start}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT P.*,T.PROJECT_NAME FROM (select A.APPLY_ID AS APPLYID,A.APPLY_CAOGERY AS CAOGERY, A.NAME AS APPLYNAME, A.CREATETIME AS APPLYDATE, A.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID from APPLY A where A.ISDELETE ='0' union ALL select U.APPLYUNIT_ID AS APPLYID,U.APPLYUNIT_CAOGERY AS CAOGERY, U.APPLYUNIT_NAME AS APPLYNAME, U.APPLYUNIT_DATE AS APPLYDATE, U.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID from APPLY_UNIT U where U.Isdelete ='0') P,PROJECT T WHERE T.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY P.PROJECT_ID,P.APPLYDATE ) A
SELECT * FROM APPLY A WHERE A.APPLY_ID = #{Apply_id} AND A.ISDELETE='0'
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLY A SET A.CHECK_STATUS=#{status} WHERE A.APPLY_ID=#{Apply_id}
UPDATE APPLY A SET A.ISDELETE='1' WHERE A.APPLY_ID=#{Apply_id}
